vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
τουτέστι,
={τοῦτ᾽ ἔστι}, that is to say, [NT+1st c.AD+]; falsa lectio in [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
that is
that is to say, by this we mean
